# Daily-exercise-17

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(readr)
library(elevatr)
library(raster)

goleta = readr::read_csv("data/uscities.csv") %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c("lng", "lat"), crs = 4326) %>%
  st_transform(5070) %>%
  filter(city == "Goleta") %>%
  st_buffer(5000)

bb = goleta %>%
  st_bbox() %>%
  st_as_sfc() %>%
  st_as_sf() %>%
  elevatr::get_elev_raster(z = 13) 

ele = crop(bb, goleta)

goleta_ele = plot(ele, main="Elevation of Goleta")

summary(ele)

```
